description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.fwZk658pceGVMQ3x]{Confusion}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.ekGy2AjztdV9mMDf]{Phantasmal Dread}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.Bmu3TVzaKPIvQWlF]{Sequestering Force}
